item.title: Python & Petrophysics Series
item.description: Python Python is a high level, object orientated programming language that does not require compilation. It is a very popular programming language due to it’s easy to read and easy to write syntax. The May 2021 rankings at https://www.tiobe.com/tiobe-index/ show that Python is the second most popular language, with C taking the top spot.
